response.name: get_flight_search

exec: // Handle the case where the refresh token is not available

item.name: info
item.description:
The top level of this directory has requests that satisfy the User Stories for Hotel Search.

In the bookings/ directory, there are additional requests that are used for fetching, creating, and cancelling hotel bookings.

item.name: notifications

response.name: get_user_notifs

item.description: This route is used to view user notifications and mark them as read -- check this last, because the other requests in this collection will send notifications to a user, and we'll look at those notifications in the requests of this folder.
